analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
